name: graphql-parse-resolve-info
description: Parse GraphQLResolveInfo (the 4th argument of resolve) into a simple tree

scripts.prepublish: mkdir -p node8plus node7minus && babel -s true --out-dir node8plus src && BABEL_ENV=node7minus babel -s true --out-dir node7minus src && ../../node_modules/.bin/flow-copy-source src node8plus
scripts.watch: mkdir -p node8plus && babel -s true --watch --out-dir node8plus src

author: Benjie Gillam <benjie@jemjie.com>
